Description: Required Skills to be successful:•   Experienced in Air Freight industry (Air Import & Export)•   Key account management abilities•   Should be well-versed with Pricing & procurement and bid management•   Ability to manage a team What equips you for the role:•   7 - 8 years in Air Freight Industry•   Advanced skills in MS Excel, experienced in Cargowise EDI or similar TMS•   Should have thorough knowledge in Perishable movements & Pharma Cargo•   Understanding to ATA Carnet processes, Exhibition Shipment clearances •   Should be well versed with Free Zone regulations, customs processes and IncotermsJob Details
